打.definition: to beat; to strike; to hit; to break; to type; to mix up; to build; to fight; to fetch; to make; to tie up; to issue; to shoot; to calculate; to play (a game); since; from

打call.definition: (slang) to cheer sb on; to show one's support; ("call" is pronounced approximately like English "call")

打一巴掌，給個甜棗.pinyin: dǎ yī bā zhǎng ， gěi gè tián zǎo
打一巴掌，給個甜棗.definition: lit. to give sb a slap, then offer a sweet date (idiom); fig. to deal harshly with sb, then offer sth by way of consolation

打下.definition: to lay (a foundation); to conquer (a city etc); to shoot down (a bird etc)

打下手.definition: to act in a supporting role; fig. to play second fiddle

打不過.definition: to be unable to defeat; to be no match for (sb)

打交道.definition: to come into contact with; to have dealings

打仗.definition: to fight a battle; to go to war

打來回.definition: to make a round trip; a return journey

打倒.definition: to overthrow; to knock down; Down with ... !

打假.definition: to fight counterfeiting; to expose as false; to denounce sb's lies

打傷.definition: to injure; to wound; to damage

打兌.definition: to arrange (colloquial); to transfer creditor's rights (in a debt case)

打入.definition: to penetrate; to break into (a market, social group etc); to infiltrate (enemy ranks etc); to banish to; to relegate to; to insert; to inject; to crack (an egg) into (a bowl etc)

打入冷宮.definition: (idiom) to snub; to consign to the trash heap of history

打出手.definition: to fling back weapons hurled at one by attackers (acrobatic performance in Chinese opera); to come to blows; to start a fight

打分.definition: to grade; to give a mark

打分數.definition: to grade (a student's work); to rate (sb's performance); to give a score

打前站.definition: to set out in advance to make arrangements (board, lodging etc); (military) to dispatch an advance party

打劫.definition: to loot; to rob; to plunder; to ransack

打勾.definition: to check; to tick; (old) to buy

打包.definition: to wrap; to pack; to put leftovers in a doggy bag for take-out; (computing) to package (i.e. create an archive file)

打千.definition: genuflection, a form of salutation in Qing times performed by men, going down on the right knee and reaching down with the right hand

打卡.definition: (of an employee) to clock on (or off); to punch in (or out); (on social media) to check in to a location

打卦.definition: to tell sb's fortune using divinatory trigrams

打印.definition: to affix a seal; to stamp; to print out (with a printer)

打口.definition: (of CDs, videos etc) surplus (or "cut-out") stock from Western countries, sometimes marked with a notch in the disc or its case, sold cheaply in China (beginning in the 1990s), as well as Eastern Europe etc

打吊瓶.definition: to put sb on an intravenous drip

打吊針.definition: to put sb on an intravenous drip

打哄.definition: to fool around; to kid around

打哆嗦.definition: to tremble; to shiver (of cold); to shudder

打哈哈.definition: to joke; to laugh insincerely; to make merry; to talk irrelevantly

打哈哈兒.definition: erhua variant of 打哈哈[da3 ha1 ha5]

打問.definition: to inquire about; to give sb the third degree

打嗝.definition: to hiccup; to belch; to burp

打嗝兒.definition: erhua variant of 打嗝[da3 ge2]

打嘴.definition: to slap sb's face; to slap one's own face; fig. to fail to live up to a boast

打圓場.definition: to help to resolve a dispute; to smooth things over

打地鋪.definition: to make one's bed on the floor

打坐.definition: to sit in meditation; to meditate

打坐坡.definition: (of a horse, dog etc) to sit back on one's haunches and refuse to be coaxed forward; (of a person) to brace oneself to resist being made to go forward; (fig.) to dig one's heels in

打垮.definition: to defeat; to strike down; to destroy

打埋伏.definition: to lie in wait; to ambush; to conceal sth

打天下.definition: to seize power; to conquer the world; to establish and expand a business; to carve out a career for oneself

打太極.definition: to practice tai chi; (fig.) to avoid responsibility; to pass the buck

打奶.definition: lit. to beat milk; to churn (to make butter); milk foamer (for cappuccino)

打官司.definition: to file a lawsuit; to sue; to dispute

打官腔.definition: to talk officiously; to assume the air of a functionary; to talk in official jargon

打官話.definition: to talk officiously; to assume the air of a functionary; to talk in official jargon

打家劫舍.definition: to break into a house for robbery (idiom)

打富濟貧.definition: to rob the rich to help the poor (idiom)

打小.definition: (dialect) from childhood; from a young age

打小報告.definition: (coll.) to tattletale; to rat on sb

打小算盤.definition: lit. to count on a narrow abacus (idiom); petty and scheming selfishly; concerned with petty interests; selfish and uncaring of the interests of others; bean counter

打尖.definition: to stop for a snack while traveling

打岔.definition: interruption; to interrupt (esp. talk); to change the subject

打工.definition: to work a temporary or casual job; (of students) to have a job outside of class time, or during vacation

打工仔.definition: young worker; employee; young male worker

打底.definition: to lay a foundation (also fig.); to make a first sketch; to eat sth before drinking; to apply an undercoat

打底子.definition: to sketch; to draft; to lay the foundation

打得火熱.definition: (idiom) to be on very good terms with each other; to hit it off with sb; to be passionately in love with each other; to carry on intimately with; (of trading, conflict etc) to be in full swing

打心眼裡.definition: from the bottom of one's heart; heartily; sincerely

打悶雷.definition: (coll.) to wonder secretly; to make wild conjectures

打成一片.definition: (idiom) to become as one (with a particular group of people); to mix well; to bond

打成平手.definition: to draw (a competition); to fight to a standstill

打扮.definition: to decorate; to dress; to make up; to adorn; manner of dressing; style of dress

打把勢.definition: drill (in sword play); to thrash around; to demonstrate gymnastic skills; to solicit financial help (in an indirect way); to show off

打把式.definition: variant of 打把勢|打把势[da3 ba3 shi5]

打折扣.definition: to give a discount; to be of less value than anticipated

打抱不平.definition: (idiom) to aid sb suffering an injustice; to fight for justice

打拋.definition: holy basil (Ocimum tenuiflorum) (loanword from Thai "kaphrao") (used as an attributive in the names of Thai-style "phat kaphrao" dishes to indicate that the main ingredient is stir-fried with basil, as in 打拋豬|打抛猪[da3pao1zhu1], stir-fried pork with basil)

打拋豬.definition: stir-fried pork with basil; pork phat kaphrao

打拍.definition: to beat time; to mark rhythm on drum or clapper boards

打招呼.definition: to greet sb by word or action; to give prior notice

打拱作揖.definition: to bow respectfully with clasped hands; to beg humbly

打拼.definition: to work hard; to try to make a living

打挺兒.definition: to arch one's body and fling one's head back

打掉.definition: to tear down; to destroy; to dismantle (a gang); to abort (a fetus)

打掉門牙，往肚子裡嚥.pinyin: dǎ diào mén yá ， wǎng dǔ zi lǐ yàn
打掉門牙，往肚子裡嚥.definition: lit. to swallow one's knocked-out teeth after getting punched in the face (idiom); fig. to endure bullying or insults stoically

打探.definition: to make discreet inquiries; to scout out

打撈.definition: to salvage; to dredge; to fish out (person or object from the sea)

打撲克.definition: to play cards; to play poker

打擂臺.definition: (old) to fight on the leitai; (fig.) to enter a contest

打擊.definition: to hit; to strike; to attack; to crack down on sth; blow; (psychological) shock; percussion (music)

打擦邊球.definition: to bend the rules; to skirt around the issue

打擾.definition: to disturb; to bother; to trouble

打擾了.definition: sorry to interrupt you, but ...; sorry to have bothered you; sorry, I have to go; (slang) (coined c. 2017) used facetiously to terminate a conversation (esp. online) when the other person is being insufferable

打攪.definition: to disturb; to trouble; to bother

打敗.definition: to defeat; to overpower; to beat; to be defeated

打散.definition: to scatter; to break sth up; to beat (an egg)

打整.definition: to arrange; to put in order; to tidy up

打新.definition: (finance) to participate in an IPO (initial public offering)

打斷.definition: to interrupt; to break off; to break (a bone)

打旋兒.definition: erhua variant of 打旋[da3 xuan2]

打早.definition: earlier; long ago; as soon as possible

打更.definition: to sound the night watches (on clappers or gongs, in former times)

打架.definition: to fight; to scuffle; to come to blows; CL:場|场[chang2]

打柴.definition: to chop firewood; to gather firewood

打格子.definition: to draw a rectangular grid (e.g. of farmland); to checker

打棍子.definition: to bludgeon; to hit with a big stick

打槍.definition: to fire a gun; to substitute for sb in sitting an examination

打橫炮.definition: to butt in; to interfere; to make things difficult

打檔車.definition: (Tw) manual transmission motorcycle (usually denotes a traditional-style motorcycle, as opposed to a scooter)

打死.definition: to kill; to beat to death

打氣.definition: to inflate; to pump up; (fig.) to encourage; to boost morale

打水.definition: to draw water; to splash water

打水漂.definition: to skip stones (on water); (coll.) to squander one's money on a bad investment

打法.definition: to play (a card); to make a move in a game

打洞.definition: to punch a hole; to drill a hole; to dig a hole; to burrow

打消.definition: to dispel (doubts, misgivings etc); to give up on

打混.definition: to muddle things up; to goof off; to hang around

打游擊.definition: to wage guerrilla warfare; to fight as a guerrilla; (fig.) (coll.) to live or eat at no fixed place

打滑.definition: to skid; to slip; to slide

打炮.definition: to open fire with artillery; to set off firecrackers; to make one's stage debut; (slang) to have sex; to masturbate

打烊.definition: to close shop in the evening; also pr. [da3 yang2]

打爆.definition: to blow out; to blow off; (computer games) to zap; (phone) to ring off the hook; to be jammed; to max out (credit card etc)

打牙祭.definition: to have a large and sumptuous meal (traditionally on the 1st and 15th of each month)

打狗.definition: Takow, Takao or Takau, old name for Kaohsiung 高雄[Gao1 xiong2] in the southwest of Taiwan

打狗欺主.definition: to beat a dog and bully its owner; fig. to humiliate sb indirectly by bullying a subordinate

打狗還得看主人.pinyin: dǎ gǒu hái dé kàn zhǔ rén
打狗還得看主人.definition: lit. when one beats a dog, one must answer to its master (idiom); fig. before punishing sb, one should consider how that would affect others associated with him

打球.definition: to play ball; to play with a ball

打理.definition: to take care of; to sort out; to manage; to put in order

打瓜.definition: a smaller variety of watermelon, with big, edible seeds

打發.definition: to dispatch sb to do sth; to make sb leave; to pass (the time); (old) to make arrangements; (old) to bestow (alms etc)

打白條.definition: to write an IOU or promissory note

打的.definition: (coll.) to take a taxi; to go by taxi

打盹兒.definition: erhua variant of 打盹[da3 dun3]

打眼.definition: to drill or bore a hole; to attract attention; conspicuous

打短兒.definition: casual labor; to work for a bit

打破砂鍋問到底.pinyin: dǎ pò shā guō wèn dào dǐ
打破砂鍋問到底.definition: to go to the bottom of things (idiom)

打碎.definition: to shatter; to smash; to break into pieces

打碼.definition: to pixelate an image; to key in captcha authentication codes

打磨.definition: to polish; to burnish; to shine

打窩.definition: (angling) to throw groundbait into an area of water

打箍.definition: to hoop; to put a hoop around sth

打算.definition: to plan; to intend; to calculate; plan; intention; calculation; CL:個|个[ge4]

打算盤.definition: to compute on the abacus; (fig.) to calculate; to plan; to scheme

打結.definition: to tie a knot; to tie

打網.definition: to net sth; to catch sth with a net

打翻.definition: to overturn; to overthrow; to strike down (an enemy)

打翻身仗.definition: to work hard towards a turnaround; to fight to reverse sth

打耳光.definition: to slap on the face; to box sb's ears

打聽.definition: to ask about; to make some inquiries; to ask around

打腫臉充胖子.pinyin: dǎ zhǒng liǎn chōng pàng zi
打腫臉充胖子.definition: lit. to swell one's face up by slapping it to look imposing (idiom); to seek to impress by feigning more than one's abilities

打臉.definition: to put on theatrical makeup; (neologism c. 2014) to debunk sb's claim; to put egg on sb's face

打草.definition: to mow grass; haymaking; to write a rough draft (of an essay etc)

打草驚蛇.definition: lit. beat the grass to scare the snake (idiom); fig. to inadvertently alert an enemy; to punish sb as a warning to others

打落水狗.definition: lit. to beat a drowning dog (idiom); fig. to pulverize an (already defeated) enemy; to hit sb when he's down

打蛇不死，後患無窮.pinyin: dǎ shé bù sǐ ， hòu huàn wú qióng
打蛇不死，後患無窮.definition: (idiom) if you beat the snake without killing it, endless evils will ensue

打蟲.definition: to swat an insect; to get rid of intestinal parasite with drugs

打製.definition: to make (by hammering, chipping etc); to forge (silverware, metal implements etc)

打諢.definition: to intersperse comic remarks (in a performance); (fig.) to quip; to banter

打賞.definition: to reward; to tip; to give a gratuity

打賭.definition: to bet; to make a bet; a wager

打賴.definition: to deny; to disclaim; to disavow

打趔趄.definition: to trip; to miss a step; to slip

打跑.definition: to run off rebuffed; to fend off; (to fight off and make sb) run off

打跟頭.definition: to turn a somersault; to turn head over heels

打躬作揖.definition: to bow respectfully with clasped hands; to beg humbly

打車.definition: to take a taxi (in town); to hitch a lift

打轉.definition: to spin; to rotate; to revolve

打退.definition: to beat back; to repel; to repulse

打退堂鼓.definition: lit. to beat the return drum (idiom); fig. to give up; to turn tail

打通.definition: to open access; to establish contact; to remove a block; to put through (a phone connection)

打造.definition: to create; to build; to develop; to forge (of metal)

打道回府.definition: to go home (in a ceremonial procession); to return home

打邊爐.definition: (Cantonese) to eat hot pot; hot pot

打邊鼓.definition: to echo what sb said; to back sb up from the sidelines (in an argument)

打醬油.definition: to buy soy sauce; it's none of my business ("I’m just here to buy some soy sauce")

打野炮.definition: (slang) to have sex outdoors or in a public place

打量.definition: to size sb up; to look sb up and down; to take the measure of; to suppose; to reckon

打針.definition: to give or have an injection

打鉤.definition: to tick; to check; tick mark; check mark

打錢.definition: to collect money from sb; to give money to sb

打錯.definition: to err; to dial a wrong number; to make a typo

打錶.definition: to run the meter (in a taxi)

打鐵趁熱.definition: strike the iron while it's hot (idiom)

打鑔.definition: (dialect) to joke; to make fun of (sb)

打長工.definition: to work as long-term hired hand

打長途.definition: to make a long distance call

打門.definition: to knock on the door; to take a shot on goal (sports)

打開.definition: to open; to show (a ticket); to turn on; to switch on

打開天窗說亮話.pinyin: dǎ kāi tiān chuāng shuō liàng huà
打開天窗說亮話.definition: (let's) not mince words; (let's) not beat about the bush

打雜.definition: to do odd jobs; to do unskilled work

打雞血.definition: lit. to inject chicken blood; (coll.) extremely excited or energetic (often used mockingly)

打雷.definition: to rumble with thunder; clap of thunder

打響.definition: to start shooting or firing; to win an initial success; to succeed (of a plan)

打頓兒.definition: erhua variant of 打頓|打顿[da3 dun4]

打飛機.definition: (slang) (of a male) to masturbate; to jerk off

打食.definition: to go in search of food (of animals); to take medicine for indigestion or gastro-intestinal upsets

打飯.definition: to get food at a canteen

打馬虎眼.definition: to play dumb; to slack off (idiom)

打馬賽克.definition: to censor an image; to pixelate

打鬧.definition: to quarrel; to squabble; to be rowdy; to play boisterously; to engage in horseplay

打鳥.definition: to shoot a bird (with a gun, slingshot etc); to photograph birds

打麻雀運動.definition: the Great Sparrow Campaign or the Four Pests Campaign, one of the actions during the Great Leap Forward 大躍進|大跃进[Da4 yue4 jin4] aiming to eliminate four pests: rats, flies, mosquitoes, and sparrows

打黑.definition: to crack down on illegal activities; to fight organized crime

打點.definition: to bribe; to get (luggage) ready; to put in order; to organize things; (baseball) RBI (run batted in)

打點滴.definition: to put sb on an intravenous drip

打鼓.definition: to beat a drum; to play a drum; (fig.) to feel nervous
